Bloonarius.desc: No fancy gimmicks, just spawns a bunch of Bloons and has a bunch of health.

normal.desc:
for every 1% of HP lost spawns **8 greens**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **30 ceramics**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **15 yellows**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **60 ceramics**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **25 pinks**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **6 MOABs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **15 zebras**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **10 ZOMGs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **25 rainbows**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **1 BAD**

elite.desc:
for every 1% of HP lost spawns **10 pinks**
for every 12.5% of HP lost spawns **70 ceramics**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **10 rainbows**
for every 12.5% of HP lost spawns **16 BFBs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **13 ceramics**
for every 12.5% of HP lost spawns **1 BAD and 9 DDTs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **12 MOABs**
for every 12.5% of HP lost spawns **2 fortified BADs and 20 fortified DDTs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **8 DDTs**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **4 fortified BAD**

Lych.desc: The Lych is complicated; it can gain health from towers sold while it's on screen and also heals from buffs along with removing them and stunning affected towers. Lych cannot heal above its starting health.
Lych.normalDesc:
**Sell Life Steal**: Heals **1%** HP per highest tier of the tower sacrificed (example: a tier 5 tower would heal 5% of lych's max HP, crosspathing doesn't matter).

**Buff Life Steal**: Heals **2%** HP for each buff stolen and stuns affected towers for **5 seconds**. The buff steal has **100 range** at tiers 1-4 and **infinite range** at tier 5. Can only steal buffs once per 12 seconds.

**Reanimated Blimps**: Reanimated blimps at each skull phase spawn based off of popped blimps from the **past 20 seconds** at all tiers. Reanimated blimps have the same properties as their normal counterparts (i.e. can be stunned, insta-killed, etc)

**Lych-Soul**: The Lych-Soul's speed is always **100%** of a Red Bloon. The Lych-Soul has the same properties as the main boss.
Lych.eliteDesc:
**Sell Life Steal**: Heals **1%** HP per highest tier of the tower sacrificed (example: a tier 5 tower would heal 5% of lych's max HP, crosspathing doesn't matter).

**Buff Life Steal**: Heals **4%** HP for each buff stolen and stuns affected towers for **5 seconds**. The buff steal has **100 range** at tiers 1-4 and **infinite range** at tier 5. Can only steal buffs once per 12 seconds.

**Reanimated Blimps**: Reanimated blimps at each skull phase spawn based off of popped blimps from the **past 20 seconds** at all tiers. Reanimated blimps have the same properties as their normal counterparts (i.e. can be stunned, insta-killed, etc)

**Lych-Soul**: The Lych-Soul's speed is always **100%** of a Red Bloon. The Lych-Soul has the same properties as the main boss.

Vortex.desc: Vortex is the fastest Boss in the game so far, but that's not all it has up its sleeve. It has lots of abilities on its damage phases, detailed below.
Vortex.normalDesc:
**Projectile Destruction**: happens immediately once Vortex reaches a damage phase AND every **5 seconds**

**Projectile Reflection**: The reflection occurs within **80r** and lasts for **6 seconds** after each damage phase and on spawn. This reflects **every** projectile except for instant-hitters (i.e. Sniper, First Strike ability, etc)..

**Tower Stun**: Affects towers within **60r** once a damage phase is reached at all tiers. During the stun, all towers affected cannot be sold.

**Knockback**: On each damage phase, Vortex is knocked back by **100 units** for all tiers.

**Slipstream**: Affects all Bloons behind Vortex, causing them to move at **2.5x** speed at all tiers.
Vortex.eliteDesc:
**Projectile Destruction**: happens immediately once Vortex reaches a damage phase AND every **5 seconds**

**Projectile Reflection**: The reflection occurs within **80r** and lasts for **6 seconds** after each damage phase and on spawn. This reflects **every** projectile except for instant-hitters (i.e. Sniper, First Strike ability, etc)..

**Tower Stun**: Affects towers within **60r** once a damage phase is reached at all tiers. During the stun, all towers affected cannot be sold.

**Knockback**: On each damage phase, Vortex is knocked back by **100 units** for all tiers.

**Slipstream**: Affects all Bloons behind Vortex, causing them to move at **2.5x** speed at all tiers.

Dreadbloon.desc: Dreadbloon has several special immunities to entire tower categories that cycle at each damage phase, while also passively spawning beefy Dreadrock Bloons, detailed below.
Dreadbloon.normalDesc:
**Immunities**: Begins with an immunity to Primary, then changes to Military -> Magic -> Support after each phase. **This also affects Paragons** of those tower categories. Immunities apply to newly spawned Dreadrock Bloons and its Ceramic Armor Shell. Dreadbloon also has **lead properties**, but this does not affect its Shell or Dreadrock Bloons.

**Ceramic Armor Shell**: Created when the boss spawns and at every damage phase. Has the HP of **half that of the entire Tier** (ex - every T1 shell has 3,750 HP). Dreadbloon moves at **0.3x speed** while its Shell is active.

**Dreadrock Bloons**: **Spawned passively** as Dreadbloon's Shell is still active. A group of Dreadrock Bloons are also spawned at each skull (exact amount unknown). Each Dreadrock Bloon has **both MOAB and BOSS properties**, and **cannot be stalled or instakilled**. Towers set to 'strong' will always target Dreadrock Bloons over everything else. The Rock's speed is always 88% of a Red Bloon.
Dreadbloon.eliteDesc:
**Immunities**: Begins with an immunity to Primary, then changes to Military -> Magic -> Support after each phase. **This also affects Paragons** of those tower categories. Immunities apply to newly spawned Dreadrock Bloons and its Ceramic Armor Shell. Dreadbloon also has **lead properties**, but this does not affect its Shell or Dreadrock Bloons.

**Ceramic Armor Shell**: Created when the boss spawns and at every damage phase. Has the HP of **half that of the entire Tier** (ex - every T1 shell has 7,500 HP). Dreadbloon moves at **0.35x speed** while its Shell is active.

**Dreadrock Bloons**: **Spawned passively** as Dreadbloon's Shell is still active. A group of Dreadrock Bloons are also spawned at each skull (exact amount unknown). Each Dreadrock Bloon has **both MOAB and BOSS properties**, and **cannot be stalled or instakilled**. Towers set to 'strong' will always target Dreadrock Bloons over everything else. The Rock's speed is always 88% of a Red Bloon.

Dreadbloon.customRounds:
Leads & Ceramics become Fortified
Zebras -> Leads
Rainbows -> Ceramics
For rounds 40-69, every other regular MOAB is fortified (BFBs+ unaffected)
For rounds 70+, every MOAB is fortified (BFBs+ unaffected)
There are some exceptions:
R 39|18 Rainbows -> 12 fLeads, 6 Ceramics
R 40|MOAB -> 10 fLeads, 8 fCeramics
R 43|10 Rainbows -> 10 fLeads
R 46|replaced by 1 fMOAB
R 60|replaced by 3 fMOABs, 40 fLeads
R 80|replaced by a copy of R75

Phayze.desc: Phayze is a camo boss bloon that has a variety of "reality-warping" gimmicks, and resistance to camo removal.
Phayze.normalDesc:
Spawns with **Camo**, and has 3 skulls.

**Dash**: on every skull, it skips forward 8% of the total track length.

**Reality Shield**: On spawn and every time a skull is reached, Phayze has a Reality Shield, of which it's HP of **1/4 of the total health of the raw blimp**. This means the **effective health** of the blimp when including the shield is **2x** the base health
The Reality Shield also increases its **movement speed** when it is active, which depends on the tier of the boss.

**Radar Jam**: disables all non-innate camo-seeing buffs as well as restoring its camo property if it has been stripped every **24s**.

**Global Attack Cooldown Multiplier**:
- skull 1: **1.1x**
- skull 2: **1.15x**
- skull 3: **1.2x**
(a multiplier of 1.1x means your towers will take 1.1x longer in between attacks)

"Opening a tear in the fabric of reality": When each skull is reached, Phayze opens a tear in the fabric reality where it was, which allows bloons to spawn further along the track. (This disappears once Phayze is killed)
Phayze.eliteDesc:
Spawns with **Camo**, and has 5 skulls.

**Dash**: on every skull, it skips forward 8% of the total track length.

**Reality Shield**: On spawn and every time a skull is reached, Phayze has a Reality Shield, of which it's HP of **1/4 of the total health of the raw blimp**. This means the **effective health** of the blimp when including the shield is **2.5x** the base health.
The Reality Shield also increases its **movement speed** when it is active, which depends on the tier of the boss.

**Radar Jam**: disables all non-innate camo-seeing buffs as well as restoring its camo property if it has been stripped every **24s**.

**Global Attack Cooldown Multiplier**: also changes based on the tier of the boss.

"Opening a tear in the fabric of reality": When each skull is reached, Phayze opens a tear in the fabric reality where it was, which allows bloons to spawn further along the track. (this disappears once Phayze is killed)
